statements.select: SELECT OperRole, OperUser, OperType, OperNote, CONVERT(NVARCHAR(20),OperDate,20) AS OperDate FROM Platform_OperLogMaster WHERE DataSource = #DataSource# AND MainId = #InstanceId# ORDER BY OperDate
statements.insert: INSERT INTO dbo.Platform_OperLogMaster (LogId, MainId, OperUser, OperUserEN, OperDate, OperType, OperNote, OperRole, DataSource, UserAccount, DataContent) VALUES (#LogId#, #MainId#, #OperUser#, #OperUserEN#, #OperDate#, #OperType#, #OperNote#, #OperRole#, #DataSource#, #UserAccount#, #DataContent#)
